participant_1.background:
I check in with my pup.
I return from the country, and my gym workout helps me get back into the rhythm of my city life.
i sing many songs.
i am a senior in high school.
I want to be in good shape for my cosplay at Comic Con, so I try to exercise every day.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my extensive book collection, which is filled with all the classics and some hidden gems.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
I work hard to help support my family, even if I'm not always the most graceful.
I spent my days listening to vinyl records and cooking healthy meals for myself.
i live in a small apartment in new york.

content.text: How are you doing today?
I'm well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! Thanks for asking.
That's good to hear.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and cook.
I like to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I'm really into historical fiction right now. I just finished reading "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah and it was amazing.
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
I also like to read science fiction and fantasy.
Those are some of my favorite genres too!
What are some of your favorite books?
I love the "Harry Potter" series by J.K. Rowling and the "Lord of the Rings" series by J.R.R. Tolkien.
I love those series too!
What are some of your favorite video games?
I like to play open-world RPGs like Skyrim and The Witcher.
I love those games too!
What are some of your favorite things to cook?
I love to cook healthy meals, like pasta with vegetables or chicken stir-fry.
I love to cook healthy meals too!
It's good to have someone to talk to about our hobbies!
Yes, it is
